tiktok.forYou.description: If you put a {0} it will be an enter (splitting the text to 2 rows), if you leave out the {0} it will all be on 1 line.

tiktok.following.description: If you put a {0} it will be an enter (splitting the text to 2 rows), if you leave out the {0} it will all be on 1 line.

tiktok.viewing.description: Name of the user will be after the ":"

tiktok.buttonViewTikTok.description: Used as the title for the button in Discord.
